title: ess插件问题
author: xia_chen
txt_content: 1.12.2spigot，装了插件，显示的全是英文！后台还自动输入指令[17:38:09 INFO]: CONSOLE issued server command: /list uuids [17:38:09 INFO]: There are 0 out of maximum 10 players online. [17:38:09 INFO]: Error: There's no one online in this group! [17:38:11 INFO]: CONSOLE issued server command: /list uuids [17:38:11 INFO]: There are 0 out of maximum 10 players online. [17:38:11 INFO]: Error: There's no one online in this group! [17:38:59 INFO]: UUID of player Xiao_qing_xu is c6419f23-5d91-45f3-bdc2-8b4ba8be7a6d [17:39:00 INFO]: Xiao_qing_xu[/116.253.40.80:22874] logged in with entity id 2139 at ([world]183.32931492772656, 78.0, 177.8081262688225) [17:39:00 INFO]: CONSOLE issued server command: /list uuids [17:39:00 INFO]: There are 1 out of maximum 10 players online. [17:39:00 INFO]: Error: There's no one online in this group! [17:39:00 WARN]: File motd.txt does not exist. Creating one for you. [17:39:00 INFO]: Creating empty config: /home/mc/mc-server/plugins/Essentials/userdata/c6419f23-5d91-45f3-bdc2-8b4ba8be7a6d.yml，有玩家在线，在外面看到是0个玩家在线.

replies.author: MayDayMemory
replies.txt_content:
倒数第二个警告只要删除motd.txt(或者转码一下)就能解决
倒数第一个删除/home/mc/mc-server/plugins/Essentials/userdata中的c6419f23-5d91-45f3-bdc2-8b4ba8be7a6d.yml
前面几个是uuid的问题,你查询不到uuid,但他也没有错误,可以尝试用其他插件查询

replies.author: MayDayMemory
replies.txt_content: 您将这个插件移出来，看看还会不会定时执行这个指令。如果是，那你就找找是不是其他插件有定时执行指令的功能。关于全是英文的问题，可能与您的操作系统有关。您用WinRAR打开插件看看里面是否有字样类似于 lang_zh_CN.properties 的文件，将这个文件的内容复制到其他文件里。如果您还有什么不明白的地方，可以加我QQ我帮您看一下。QQ: 286799714
